original_title: Mortal Sin: Out of the Darkness
overview: The main concert was recorded live at the Annandale Hotel in Sydney on March 5th 2004.  The "Live Archival Footage" was filmed at The Seven Hills Inn (Sydney, N.S.W., Australia) on the 18th September 1987.  Track 14.6 is a Diamond Head cover.  The concert comes in widescreen 16/9, and there's a choice of either 2.0 stereo or 5.1 surround sound.  Limited to 1000 copies.
title: Mortal Sin: Out of the Darkness
